Description:
An adversary may use legitimate desktop support and remote access software, such as Team Viewer, Go2Assist, LogMein, AmmyyAdmin, etc, to establish an interactive command and control channel to target systems within networks.
These services are commonly used as legitimate technical support software, and may be allowed by application control within a target environment.
Remote access tools like VNC, Ammyy, and Teamviewer are used frequently when compared with other legitimate software commonly used by adversaries. (Citation: Symantec Living off the Land)


Author: frack113, Connor Martin
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query To Remote Access Software Domain From Non-Browser App
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((query_name="*.rustdesk.com" query_name="rs-*") OR (query_name="*agent.jumpcloud.com" OR query_name="*agentreporting.atera.com" OR query_name="*ammyy.com" OR query_name="*api.parsec.app" OR query_name="*api.playanext.com" OR query_name="*api.splashtop.com" OR query_name="*app.atera.com" OR query_name="*assist.zoho.com" OR query_name="*authentication.logmeininc.com" OR query_name="*beyondtrustcloud.com" OR query_name="*cdn.kaseya.net" OR query_name="*client.teamviewer.com" OR query_name="*comserver.corporate.beanywhere.com" OR query_name="*control.connectwise.com" OR query_name="*downloads.zohocdn.com" OR query_name="*dwservice.net" OR query_name="*express.gotoassist.com" OR query_name="*getgo.com" OR query_name="*getscreen.me" OR query_name="*integratedchat.teamviewer.com" OR query_name="*join.zoho.com" OR query_name="*kickstart.jumpcloud.com" OR query_name="*license.bomgar.com" OR query_name="*logmein-gateway.com" OR query_name="*logmein.com" OR query_name="*logmeincdn.http.internapcdn.net" OR query_name="*n-able.com" OR query_name="*net.anydesk.com" OR query_name="*netsupportsoftware.com" OR query_name="*parsecusercontent.com" OR query_name="*pubsub.atera.com" OR query_name="*relay.kaseya.net" OR query_name="*relay.screenconnect.com" OR query_name="*relay.splashtop.com" OR query_name="*remoteassistance.support.services.microsoft.com" OR query_name="*remotedesktop-pa.googleapis.com" OR query_name="*remoteutilities.com" OR query_name="*secure.logmeinrescue.com" OR query_name="*services.vnc.com" OR query_name="*static.remotepc.com" OR query_name="*swi-rc.com" OR query_name="*swi-tc.com" OR query_name="*tailscale.com" OR query_name="*telemetry.servers.qetqo.com" OR query_name="*tmate.io" OR query_name="*twingate.com" OR query_name="*zohoassist.com")) NOT ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*" process_path="*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe" (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe")) OR (process_path="*\\MsMpEng.exe" OR process_path="*\\MsSense.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Opera\\*" process_path="*\\opera.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Vivaldi\\*" process_path="*\\vivaldi.exe") OR process_path="*\\Tor Browser\\*" OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Waterfox\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Waterfox\\*") process_path="*\\Waterfox.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\midori-ng\\*" process_path="*\\Midori Next Generation.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Phoebe\\*" process_path="*\\Phoebe.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe") OR (process_path="*\\brave.exe" process_path="C:\\Program Files\\BraveSoftware\\*") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Falkon\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Falkon\\*") process_path="*\\falkon.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") (process_path="*\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="*\\msedgewebview2.exe")) OR process_path="*\\safari.exe" OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Maxthon\\*" process_path="*\\maxthon.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\SeaMonkey\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SeaMonkey\\*") process_path="*\\seamonkey.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Naver\\Naver Whale\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Naver\\Naver Whale\\*") process_path="*\\whale.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Avant Browser\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Avant Browser\\*") process_path="*\\avant.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files\\SlimBrowser\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SlimBrowser\\*") process_path="*\\slimbrowser.exe") OR (process_path="*\\AppData\\Local\\Flock\\*" process_path="*\\Flock.exe"))
